Username.minlength: Email or Username is too short
Username.maxlength: Email or Username is too long

Labels.Provide: Provide a new password for your account

Text.Reset: To reset your password, enter the email address you use to sign in to GOLDMINT.IO. It can be your email address, an email address you use with one of the social networks, or any email address associated with your account.

Recovery.FirstLine: We've sent you an email containing a password recovery link. You will be able to reset your password by clicking the link within the next 24 hours. Please click on the button in your email.
Recovery.SecondLine: If you don't see the email, be sure to check the spam folder.

Username.minlength: Should be at least 3 symbols length

Email.pattern: Should be a valid email address, at least 5 symbols length

Password.minlength: Should be at least 6 symbols length
Password.maxlength: Should be up to 128 symbols length
Password.pattern: Should contain uppercase letters, lowercase letters and digits

Register.Links: Already own an account? Sign in

SuccessPage.Title: Registered
SuccessPage.Content: We have sent you confirmation email. Please check your email and follow confirmation link.

EmailConfirmedPage.Title: Email confirmation
EmailConfirmedPage.ContentSuccess: Your email has been successfully confirmed. Now you are free to sign in.
EmailConfirmedPage.ContentFailure: There was an error while email confirmation. Please contact our support team.

EmailTakenPage.Title: This email is already taken
EmailTakenPage.Content: We are sorry, but email you specified is already taken. Please try another one.

NewPassword.minlength: Should be at least 6 symbols length

DefaultSection.Title: Identity verification
DefaultSection.Text: Complete verification to withdraw fiat funds and unlock account opportinities
DefaultSection.Note: Verification procedures is very sumple and intuitive. We will only ask you to provide is some personal information and supporting documents.
DefaultSection.UpgradeText: Complete verification to withdraw fiat funds and unlock account opportinities
DefaultSection.UpgradeNote: Verification procedures is very sumple and intuitive. We will only ask you to provide is some personal information and supporting documents.

WarningSection.Title: Advanced verification
WarningSection.Text: Unverified accounts cannot make any fiat operaions. You will be redirected to identity verification service.
WarningSection.TextPending: Advanced verification is still in progress. Please come back later or try to refresh this page.

AgreementSection.Title: Sign agreement
AgreementSection.Text: Complete verification by signing Goldmint agreement. Agreement will be sent to your primary email address.
AgreementSection.TextPending: Agreement signing is still in progress. Please come back later or try to refresh this page.

FormSection.Title: Basic Information
FormSection.NewAccountText: NEW ACCOUNT. Please submit the information below to apply for a basic account. Please use your full legal name as it axists on your government identification.
FormSection.Important: IMPORTANT: once submitted, all the information cannot be changed. Please ensure the spelling is correct.
FormSection.UpgradeAccountText: UPGRADE ACCOUNT. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Consectetur vel eos perspiciatis aliquid officia labore expedita ipsam sequi totam magnam aspernatur libero quia, itaque eveniet pariatur omnis molestias, suscipit corporis.

FirstName.minLength: Name should be at least 2 symbols length

LastName.minLength: Name should be at least 2 symbols length

SecretKeySection.Title: Two-factor authentication
SecretKeySection.WarningText: Two-factor authentication (2FA) greatly increases security by requiring both your password and another form of authentication. Goldmint implements 2FA utilizing Google Authenticator. To enable this feature simply download Google Authenticator on your mobile device and scan the CPCode. Once you have linked the Authenticator with Bittrex, enter the 6 digit code provic ed.
SecretKeySection.Text: Please back up your secret key. Reseting two-factor authentication requires opening a support ticket and may take up to 7 days.

NetworksSection.Title: Social Networks
NetworksSection.Text: You can sign in into app.goldmint.io with your Social Network account

404.Heading: Error 404. Page not found
404.SectionTitle: Use the menu to navigate the site
